00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup EBI_Exported_Types EBI exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 typedef struct
00053 {
00054   u32 EBI_Bank;
00055   u32 EBI_Mode;
00056   u32 EBI_IdleCycle;
00057   u32 EBI_ChipSelectPolarity;
00058   u32 EBI_AddressLatchPolarity;
00059   u32 EBI_WriteEnablePolarity;
00060   u32 EBI_ReadEnablePolarity;
00061   u32 EBI_IdleCycleTime;
00062   u32 EBI_AddressSetupTime;
00063   u32 EBI_AddressHoldTime;
00064   u32 EBI_WriteSetupTime;
00065   u32 EBI_WriteStrobeTime;
00066   u32 EBI_WriteHoldTime;
00067   u32 EBI_ReadSetupTime;
00068   u32 EBI_ReadStrobeTime;
00069   u32 EBI_ReadHoldTime;
00070 } EBI_InitTypeDef;
00071 /**
00072   * @}
00073   */

00075 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00076 /** @defgroup EBI_Exported_Constants EBI exported constants
00077   * @{
00078   */
00079 #define EBI_BANK_0                                  ((u32)0x00000000)
00080 #define EBI_BANK_1                                  ((u32)0x00000001)
00081 #define EBI_BANK_2                                  ((u32)0x00000002)
00082 #define EBI_BANK_3                                  ((u32)0x00000003)
00083 
00084 #define IS_EBI_BANK(BANK)                           ((BANK == EBI_BANK_0) || \
00085                                                      (BANK == EBI_BANK_1) || \
00086                                                      (BANK == EBI_BANK_2) || \
00087                                                      (BANK == EBI_BANK_3))
00088 
00089 
00090 #define EBI_MODE_D8A8                               ((u32)0x00000000)
00091 #define EBI_MODE_D16A16ALE                          ((u32)0x00000001)
00092 #define EBI_MODE_D8A24ALE                           ((u32)0x00000002)
00093 #define EBI_MODE_D16                                ((u32)0x00000003)
00094 
00095 #define IS_EBI_MODE(MODE)                           ((MODE == EBI_MODE_D8A8)      || \
00096                                                      (MODE == EBI_MODE_D16A16ALE) || \
00097                                                      (MODE == EBI_MODE_D8A24ALE)  || \
00098                                                      (MODE == EBI_MODE_D16))
00099 
00100 
00101 #define EBI_IDLECYCLE_ENABLE                        ((u32)0x00000000)
00102 #define EBI_IDLECYCLE_DISABLE                       ((u32)0x00001000)
00103 
00104 #define IS_EBI_IDLECYCLE(IDLECYCLE)                 ((IDLECYCLE == EBI_IDLECYCLE_ENABLE) || \
00105                                                      (IDLECYCLE == EBI_IDLECYCLE_DISABLE))
00106 
00107 
00108 #define EBI_CHIPSELECTPOLARITY_LOW                  ((u32)0x00000000)
00109 #define EBI_CHIPSELECTPOLARITY_HIGH                 ((u32)0x00000001)
00110 
00111 #define IS_EBI_CS_POLARITY(POLARITY)                ((POLARITY == EBI_CHIPSELECTPOLARITY_LOW) || \
00112                                                      (POLARITY == EBI_CHIPSELECTPOLARITY_HIGH))
00113 
00114 
00115 #define EBI_ADDRESSLATCHPOLARITY_LOW                ((u32)0x00000000)
00116 #define EBI_ADDRESSLATCHPOLARITY_HIGH               ((u32)0x00000001)
00117 
00118 #define IS_EBI_ALE_POLARITY(POLARITY)               ((POLARITY == EBI_ADDRESSLATCHPOLARITY_LOW) || \
00119                                                      (POLARITY == EBI_ADDRESSLATCHPOLARITY_HIGH))
00120 
00121 
00122 #define EBI_WRITEENABLEPOLARITY_LOW                 ((u32)0x00000000)
00123 #define EBI_WRITEENABLEPOLARITY_HIGH                ((u32)0x00000001)
00124 
00125 #define IS_EBI_WE_POLARITY(POLARITY)                ((POLARITY == EBI_WRITEENABLEPOLARITY_LOW) || \
00126                                                      (POLARITY == EBI_WRITEENABLEPOLARITY_HIGH))
00127 
00128 
00129 #define EBI_READENABLEPOLARITY_LOW                  ((u32)0x00000000)
00130 #define EBI_READENABLEPOLARITY_HIGH                 ((u32)0x00000001)
00131 
00132 #define IS_EBI_RE_POLARITY(POLARITY)                ((POLARITY == EBI_READENABLEPOLARITY_LOW) || \
00133                                                      (POLARITY == EBI_READENABLEPOLARITY_HIGH))
00134 
00135 
00136 #define IS_EBI_IDLE_CYCLE_TIME(TIME)                (TIME < 0x10)
00137 
00138 #define IS_EBI_ADDRESS_SETUP_TIME(TIME)             (TIME < 0x10)
00139 
00140 #define IS_EBI_ADDRESS_HOLD_TIME(TIME)              (TIME < 0x10)
00141 
00142 #define IS_EBI_WRITE_SETUP_TIME(TIME)               (TIME < 0x10)
00143 
00144 #define IS_EBI_WRITE_STROBE_TIME(TIME)              (TIME < 0x40)
00145 
00146 #define IS_EBI_WRITE_HOLD_TIME(TIME)                (TIME < 0x10)
00147 
00148 #define IS_EBI_READ_SETUP_TIME(TIME)                (TIME < 0x10)
00149 
00150 #define IS_EBI_READ_STROBE_TIME(TIME)               (TIME < 0x40)
00151 
00152 #define IS_EBI_READ_HOLD_TIME(TIME)                 (TIME < 0x10)

00154   * @}
00155   */
